project.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

1.title: Quotes App
1.desc: A mobile app that provides inspirational quotes and allows users to create custom quote images.

2.title: Weather Forecast App
2.desc: A web app that shows real-time weather updates for any city using OpenWeather API.

3.title: Calendar Planner
3.desc: A smart planner to organize tasks and manage schedules efficiently.
